dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2638319I] Unauthorized Prepaid Card sites detected (Request for Removal)*

t
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 18, 2007 8:40 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2638319I] Unauthorized Prepaid Card sites detected
(Request for Removal)***

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

m>

From: "Tiffany Robinson" <tiffany_robinson@mastercard.com>
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=_alternative
0066D4D385257267_=" 
MIME-Version: 1.0
X-Mailer: Lotus Notes Release 6.5.1 January 21, 2004
X-Disclaimed: 38195
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of mastercard.com
designates 207.46.163.16 as permitted sender) client-ip=207.46.163.16;
envelope-from=tiffany_robinson@mastercard.com;
helo=outbound2-cpk-R.bigfish.com;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 18 Jan 2007 18:43:30.0264 (UTC)
FILETIME=[8C5BBD80:01C73B30] 

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear ThePlanet.com Security Administrator: 
 
Re: Unauthorized Prepaid Card site detected 
 
MasterCard International has recently been notified by consumers and/or
law enforcement with respect to apparent unauthorized use of the
MasterCard brand. 
 
Listed below is the site that has been brought to the attention of
MasterCard.  This site is not in compliance with our standards, and
could be damaging not only to MasterCard and your organization, but the

customers as well.    To date, our internal investigation has determined

that there is unauthorized use of the MasterCard brand on this site. 
 
The domain names are listed as follows:  
 
http://maestro-no-name.my-atm-card.biz/maestro-no-name_us.php?sid=a6dc2c
47898bc937f2385bc84e5e5310 
 
On behalf of MasterCard International, in order to prevent possible
fraudulent activity on the above mentioned site(s), we request your
cooperation in permanently removing any reference to MasterCard, or the
MasterCard brand marks, from the above mentioned site. 
 
Please confirm that any reference to MasterCard, or any MasterCard brand
marks pictured, have been removed, and advise us with any questions
and/or concerns. You may reach us through our hotline email address at:

Website_Compliance@mastercard.com 
 
Thank you very much in advance for your assistance in this matter. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
 
Global Security and Risk Services
MasterCard International Incorporated
Email: Website_Compliance@mastercard.com 
 
 
 
 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE 
This e-mail message and any attachments are only for the use of the
intended recipient and may contain information that is privileged,
confidential or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you are
not the intended recipient, any disclosure, distribution or other use of
this e-mail message or attachments is prohibited. If you have received
this e-mail message in error, please delete and notify the sender
immediately. Thank you.
